initBlock.name: Gregorian Calendar - Trailing 5 Quarters
initBlock.description: Defaults to the last 5 quarters + current quarter
tags: Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

selectStatements.query:
SELECT
    'TRAILING_5_GREGORIAN_QUARTERS',B.CAL_QUARTER_CODE
FROM
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_QUARTER_ID, CURRENT_CAL_QTR_CODE ,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_QUARTER_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_QUARTER_D 
    )A,
    ( SELECT 
        CAL_QUARTER_ID, CAL_QUARTER_CODE ,
        (COUNT(1) OVER (ORDER BY CAL_QUARTER_ID)
        ) AS RUN_COUNT 
      FROM
        DW_QUARTER_D 
    )B 
WHERE
    A.CURRENT_CAL_QTR_CODE = 'Current'
AND B.RUN_COUNT BETWEEN A.RUN_COUNT-5 AND A.RUN_COUNT
